phases.title: Phase 1
phases.deliverable: Basic file upload functionality for study documents
tasks: Set up the project structure with a Python backend and Next.js frontend
Implement file upload endpoint in the backend using Python and Flask/Django
Create a simple upload form in the frontend using React
Test file upload functionality with a sample document
phases.commit_condition: Users can successfully upload study documents and receive a confirmation response
phases.example_input: User selects a PDF or Word document and clicks 'Upload'

phases.title: Phase 2
phases.deliverable: Initial database schema for study materials and question nodes
tasks: Design the database schema for storing study documents and their associated questions
Create MySQL tables for study documents and nodes with relationships defined between parent and child nodes
Implement basic data insertion logic for study documents based on uploaded files
phases.commit_condition: The database schema is defined, tables are created, and at least one study document with child nodes is inserted into the database
phases.example_input: Study document titled 'Biology Basics' uploaded which includes topics like 'Cell Structure' and 'Genetics'
phases.example_output: Database entries created for 'Biology Basics' with child nodes for 'Cell Structure' and 'Genetics'

phases.title: Phase 3
phases.deliverable: Functionality to generate question nodes based on uploaded study documents
tasks: Implement a parser to read content from uploaded study documents
Generate initial question nodes based on the content extracted from the study documents
Store generated question nodes in the MySQL database, linking them to corresponding study materials
phases.commit_condition: Question nodes are successfully generated and stored in the database for each uploaded study document

example_input.study_document:
Introduction to Python Programming
1. What is a variable?
2. Explain the concept of loops.

phases.title: Phase 4
phases.deliverable: Functionality to visualize the question nodes in a structured format
tasks: Develop a front-end component to display question nodes as a tree structure
Implement the logic to fetch and organize question nodes from the database
Ensure that the visualization updates dynamically as new nodes are added
phases.commit_condition: The user can view a visual representation of question nodes as a tree structure.

question_nodes.text: What is the basic concept of OOP?

phases.title: Phase 5
phases.deliverable: Functionality to interact with question nodes and answer them
tasks: Implement the frontend interface for displaying question nodes and submitting answers
Create backend API endpoints to handle answers submitted by users and validate them against the AI-generated criteria
Integrate the frontend and backend to ensure seamless communication for answering questions and receiving feedback
phases.commit_condition: Users can interact with question nodes, submit answers, and receive feedback on their correctness based on the AI criteria
phases.example_input: User clicks on a question node and submits an answer: 'The main differences between X and Y are...'
phases.example_output: Response indicates the answer's accuracy: 'Your answer is 70% correct. Here are some additional points to consider...'

phases.title: Phase 6
phases.deliverable: AI response evaluation system for answers submitted by users
tasks: Implement AI criteria for assessing the correctness of user answers based on uploaded study materials
Create a scoring system that assigns marks based on the closeness of the user's answer to the expected response
Integrate the evaluation system with the existing question node interaction functionality
phases.commit_condition: The system can evaluate user answers and provide scores based on established AI criteria
phases.example_input: User submits the answer 'The mitochondria is the powerhouse of the cell.' for a question about cell organelles.
phases.example_output: Score: 8/10, Comments: 'Good explanation but could include more details about energy production.'

phases.title: Phase 7
phases.deliverable: Integration of feedback mechanism for AI answer evaluations
tasks: Implement a feedback system for users to rate the AI's response evaluation
Design and create a database table to store user feedback on answers
Develop a mechanism to collect and analyze feedback to improve AI evaluation
phases.commit_condition: Users can provide feedback on the AI's response evaluation, and the feedback is stored in the database
phases.example_input: User submits a rating of 4 stars and a comment about the AI's answer matching their expectations
phases.example_output: Feedback stored successfully with a rating of 4 and the comment saved in the database

phases.title: Phase 8
phases.deliverable: Enhanced AI criteria for diverse question types
tasks: Develop a module to generate diverse types of questions (multiple choice, short answer, etc.) based on study materials
Create unique AI evaluation criteria for each question type, ensuring tailored feedback
Implement user interface changes to support different question types and display evaluation results
phases.commit_condition: The system can generate and evaluate diverse question types based on study materials, with proper feedback displayed to the user.
phases.example_input: Study document about photosynthesis; Generate questions like 'What is the process of photosynthesis?' and 'Which organelle is responsible for photosynthesis?'
phases.example_output: Question 1: What is the process of photosynthesis? | Evaluation: Good, your answer covers the basic process, but missing detail about light absorption.

phases.title: Phase 9
phases.deliverable: Implementation of progress tracking system for user advancement through question nodes
tasks: Develop a progress tracking model in the database to record which nodes a user has defeated
Implement logic to restrict access to parent nodes until all child nodes are completed
Create a user interface component that visually represents user progress through the question node structure
phases.commit_condition: Users can see their progress and can only access parent nodes after defeating all child nodes
phases.example_input: User answers questions from child nodes under a parent node
phases.example_output: User can access the parent node only after all child questions have been answered correctly

phases.title: Phase 10
phases.deliverable: Complete project with all features functional and a user flow from document upload to answering questions and progress tracking.
tasks: Conduct final testing to ensure all functionalities operate as intended
Fix any identified bugs or issues in the system
Prepare documentation for users on how to utilize the platform
Deploy the project to a server for live access
Gather initial user feedback for improvements
phases.commit_condition: All functionalities are tested, documented, and the project is deployed for user access without critical issues.

uploaded_questions: Describe the process of cellular respiration.

example_output.user_progress: User has defeated all child nodes and can access the parent node.
